properties.name: nstable
properties.description: The number of stable populations required to be observed during the duration of an experiment. Default is 5.

properties.name: fcMax
properties.description: Maximum allowable increase relative to presumed ’good’ data

properties.name: nCellCutoff
properties.description: An integer; represents the minimum number of cells a population must have tobe included in analysis.

properties.name: cutoff
properties.description: Method for determining threshold for parameter.  Can be "median" (default) or in [0, 1], which is interpreted as a percentile. Integers > 1 will be interpreted as the fluorescence value to be used for a threshold

properties.name: binSize
properties.description: A number in [0,1]; represents the fraction of duration of collection per bin.
